name: Ping Pong Pro
description:
After the ball has touched one side of the table, it must be hit on the other side. After each hit the racket gets disabled until the ball hits the table's surface again.

Each collision with the table gives one point.

If the Ball hits one side twice or falls off the table the game is lost.
Additionally after a while additional obstacles will appear on the table.

I hope you will enjoy this little game I created using the Godot Game Engine.
